cs567.smoke
Class SmokeKeyframe

java.lang.Object
  cs567.smoke.SmokeKeyframe

public class SmokeKeyframe
extends java.lang.Object

Smoke keyframe or "smokey frame" ;) based on an input image that is resized to a square grid of resolution specified in Constants.

Field Summary
(package private)  float[] fdx
          Constant part of driving-force field: (fdx,fdy) = (GRAD rhoGoalBlur)/rhoGoalBlur.
(package private)  float[] fdy
          Constant part of driving-force field: (fdx,fdy) = (GRAD rhoGoalBlur)/rhoGoalBlur.
(package private)  float[] rhoGoal
          Goal density of this keyframe.
(package private)  float[] rhoGoalBlur
          Blurred goal density.
(package private)  float rhoGoalSum
          sum(rhoGoal) in case you need it ;)
